title: Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream by senior interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream A dog is one of the animals that many people love and prefer, but there are those who fear it and fear its bite because it is painful and requires a lot of healing time, and on a different site we will talk about the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream for a single woman If a dog bites a girl Unmarried in a dream, this indicates that there are people conspiring against her in real life. The presence of a black dog in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of those who wish her harm in her life. The presence of a white dog in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the approaching marriage of a young man with Morals and religion. A single girl’s dream of a dog is evidence that her close friend never wishes her well, but she wishes her all the best. If you see a red dog in an unmarried woman’s dream, this means that she will soon be exposed to deception. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream for a manA man’s dream Being bitten by his dog, this dream indicates the presence of a disreputable lady in his life. A man’s dream of many dogs, his dream indicates that there are many people around him and in his life who hate him. A man seeing a dog in a dream that did not harm him indicates that the life he will live will be a good life. If a person dreams that he is drinking dog milk, then his vision indicates that he will remain oppressed and persecuted. Dreaming about a young man being bitten by a dog, and this dream indicates the victory of his enemies over him, as this dream explains the dreamer’s journey on the path of sin and the forbidden. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates A pregnant woman’s dream of a dog in a dream indicates that there is someone in her life who wishes her harm and does not want her pregnancy to end well. A dog in a divorced woman’s dream. The dog appears in this dream to her ex-husband. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a dog in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the presence of a corrupt man. In her real life and that it will harm her in her life. A dream of a dog for a married woman indicates that her husband speaks ill of her in public places. If a married woman sees a dog in her dream, this indicates that her husband is cheating on her and she will expose him and ask him to separate and divorce. A gray dog ​​in a married woman’s dream indicates The presence of an unjust person near her. Dreaming of a brown dog in a married woman’s life indicates that there are those around her who wish her harm, are jealous of her life, and wish her loss. Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream: If a dog bites his hand. If the dreamer sees that a dog has bitten his hand, then this The dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a financial and material crisis soon in his life. Also, dreaming of a dog biting his hand shows the dreamer that he is wasting his money without any benefit and does not bring him any benefit. Dreaming of a dog biting his hand in a dream sometimes indicates that the dreamer gets his money from A prohibited source and he needs to reconsider his action. If the dreamer sees that a dog bites his hand, then this dream indicates a disaster for the dreamer that he will never be able to get rid of. If a man sees that he is bitten by a dog, then his dream indicates that he is beating his wife and he must reconsider his actions. With her, because God is punishing him for this act that he is doing.Interpretation of a dog bite F

title: Interpretation of the moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: All you are looking for to know the interpretation of the moon in a dreamInterpretation of the moon in a dreamWhat are the signs of seeing the full moon? Is it different from seeing the crescent or not? What did the jurists explain by seeing the moon and the sun together? Are the interpretations of seeing the moon bad or do they contain promising indications? The details are explained in the following article and you will learn about the most important meanings of this dream. Do you have a confusing dream? What are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreamsMoon in a dreamAl-Nabulsi said that the moon in the dreamer's dream who intends to travel indicates income and livelihood, and the fuller the moon is, the vision shows an increase in the dreamer's wealth and fortune and the great happiness he obtains as a result. A short trip. The symbol of the crescent moon in a dream is promising and interprets nutrition and new and useful beginnings, even if its color is green or white, the good that the dreamer enjoys will be great. The dreamer who has been unemployed for a long time and is in debt and needs money to continue his life and sees in a dream that the moon is large and has a comfortable shape, God will make his affairs easy for him, and give him a job opportunity full of money and abundant livelihood, and perhaps the moon indicates private trade, thus developing the dreamer's material and social status. If the fortune teller loves religion and religious and legal sciences in reality, and sees himself looking at the moon in a dream, then he learns in reality at the hands of a large number of religious scholars and may become like them in wakefulness. Life in terms of reputation and degree of knowledge and knowledge. And whoever is guided by the light of the moon in a dream, seeks knowledge, or finds solutions to his problems, or God takes him out of the circle of darkness and confusion and leads him to the right path. Whoever sees in his dream that the people of the city or state are standing in the streets and looking at the moon and smiling and happy, this symbolizes the justice and prosperity in which they live, because the ruler of the state is wise and God-fearing in his actions. But if the moon is red or its shape is frightening and it appears in the dream that the people of the state are afraid of it, then the dream shows the cruelty of the ruler and the injustice of a large number of people. Seeing the moon in a dream for Ibn Sirin The appearance of the moon symbol for Ibn Sirin in a dream indicates more than one meaning, a large number of people. And the larger the size of the moon and the greater its brightness, the more the seer knows that people benefit from him and need him. The fortune teller, if he has strong personal and professional qualities that allow him to have a high position and status in reality, and sees the moon in his dream, he can become a boss at work or reach a higher position than that, then he is a minister with an audible voice In the country. Seeing the moon falling in a dream for Ibn Sirin The moon falling in a dream may mean benefit, or sadness, fear, and misguidance, as follows: Or not: If the dreamer sees that the moon has fallen from the sky in a dream, and the world becomes frighteningly dark, he loses his strength, or cries in his life and his worries increase, and he may lose his way and live lost. And he lost a period of time, even if he was a well-known scholar in the country, then perhaps God will kill his life. Second: If the moon was frightening and did not radiate clear light, and suddenly fell into the river, and the dreamer's feeling was in

title: Interpretation of supplication in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Supplication in the rain in a dream Supplication is referring to God by raising hands at any time to ask for wishes and what a person wants in his life and to confirm that this will come true, and it is stated in the Book of God Almighty: This and I would be curious to know about it. The interpretations said by the commentators, and here we consider together the most important things that were said in detail about this vision, so follow us. Praying in the rain in a dream Dream interpreters say that seeing prayer in the rain means that good and abundant food comes to the dreamer. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream praying in the rain symbolizes That she will soon hear good news and reach her goal. As for seeing a woman in a dream praying when the rain falls, it indicates the good deeds that she does and a good reputation among the people. If the sick person sees in a dream that he is praying in the rain, this means that the time of recovery is near and he will enjoy... In good health. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream begging in the rain, this gives her good news of an imminent marriage to a suitable person for her. A pregnant woman, if she sees in a dream begging in the rain, symbolizes an easy birth and the provision of the desired baby. Praying in the rain in a dream for a son Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing praying in the rain symbolizes the great and abundant livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in her life. If the dreamer sees her praying during the rain in a dream, this indicates the successes that have been achieved for her on the professional and social level. If a married woman sees in In a dream, she is begging in the rain, this gives her good news about a stable married life, without disputes. But when a person sees in a dream his prayer in the rain, this means that he reaches his goal, satisfies his desires, and occupies the highest positions. If the dreamer is suffering from problems and sees in the dream If a schoolgirl sees begging in the rain in a dream, it means that she will soon get results. Good as a result of its superiority. Praying in the rain in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that seeing prayer in the rain in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s wedding date is approaching, and he will have many good things. If the dreamer sees her praying for rain in a dream, this indicates that the doors Goodness and happiness will open to her. As for the dreamer who sees her praying in the rain in a dream, it symbolizes a stable and trouble-free married life. What is the interpretation of praying in the rain in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees that she is praying in the rain in a dream, this will lead to goodness And the blessings that she will find in her life and she will be happy with it. If the dreamer sees in a dream begging in the rain, it portends a close marriage with a person who suits her and has a high social status. Seeing a schoolgirl in a dream praying in the rain symbolizes achieving many successes in her life and achieving what she wants And if the dreamer sees...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person carrying water according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person carrying water: There are many situations in which the dreamer sees a dead person in his dreams, some of which emphasize goodness, while other interpretations of them may be difficult and unpopular. What does it mean to see a dead person carrying water, using it, or offering it to the dreamer? We focus on this in our article.Interpretation of seeing a dead person carrying water by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a dead person carrying waterIf you see a dead person carrying water in your dream, you will be close to comfort and kindness and you are about to begin a different season full of joy and good news.But if the water carried by the dead person is Unsuitable or polluted, it expresses the crises that will befall you in the coming days, God forbid. And if you drink the water that was with him in your vision, this gives you good news about the abundance of money that you will possess, which will likely come to you without much effort. There are other meanings associated with the previous dream, such as quickly paying off debts, and the person’s attempt to do a lot to get rid of the worries that haunt him because of him. And if the deceased finds himself drinking the water he is carrying, the dream shows how many few good deeds he has, which will punish him, and hence a lot of good deeds must be given. Give alms to that person until he receives forgiveness. Interpretation of seeing a dead person carrying water by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of carrying water from a dead person differs according to Ibn Sirin depending on the condition of this water, because its purity and beauty express beloved events and situations and the proximity of joys to a person. As for polluted and turbid water, it warns of many obstacles and falling into various obstacles that surround the person. For a person, and therefore it is advisable to protect himself as much as possible if he sees this in his dream. It indicates that the dead person who asks the dreamer for water is in dire need of his many good deeds for his sake, such as supplication, reading the Qur’an, visiting and giving charity to his soul, and God knows best. And if he drinks water in your dream He wants to convey to you a message about the situation that may be difficult while he is in it, and you must help him by praying for him and showing mercy to him. And if he offers you water and you drink it, then there is great joy and happiness that you will succeed in reaching soon. It may be related to your marital relationship or in general to material and living conditions. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important interpretive scholars. Interpretation of seeing the dead carrying water for unmarried women. Seeing the dead is linked to many meanings, because some of them belong to him and others are linked to the dreamer himself. But if it contains water Very impure, the dream means that there are events that the girl rejects and does not want to happen at all, but she will most likely go through them and God knows best. And if that water is in his hand, and the girl approaches it and eats it, then the sorrows will leave, she will automatically leave her reality, and her difficult and tense situation will calm down. After she goes through unfavorable material circumstances, her life can flourish again and she has a profitable opportunity to change her work situation, which gives her abundant profits, and this at the same time gives money.

title: Interpretation of the desert in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the desert in a dream is one of the topics that raises controversy among many people when they see it in a dream. Seeing the desert has many connotations, sometimes good things may appear and sometimes some unpleasant things. The interpretation of the vision varies depending on the psychological, social, and health conditions of the people, as it is not possible to generalize the interpretation of the dream based on all people, and in the following encyclopedia article we try to clarify some of the interpretations of seeing the desert in a dream.Interpretation of the desert in a dreamInterpretation of the desert in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says that seeing the desert in a dream This vision shows the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness, as well as the worries and problems that the dreamer is going through, but seeing sand in a dream means goodness, a lot of nourishment, and good and happy news. If one sees the desert in a dream and it contains water, then this dream indicates good luck that The dreamer will have it. Seeing the desert in a dream empty of water, in this vision is an indication that the dreamer is suffering from many crises and problems. Seeing a man in a dream that he is in the desert and that there are many snakes and scorpions, in this dream is evidence that the man is hearing bad news. A man who sees in his dream a storm in the desert is evidence that he is suffering from grave injustice and oppression. A person seeing in a dream that he is searching for lost things in the desert. If a person sees that he is walking in the desert, this means a great loss in his money. A person saw that he is walking in the desert The desert was wide, and he felt happy as he walked. Interpretation of seeing the desert in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that if you see the desert in a dream with plants and trees, then this dream is an indication of the fulfillment of many desires and the achievement of the goal that the dreamer wants to achieve, and his vision may indicate the upcoming journey of the pioneer Seeing a person walking in the desert is evidence of a change in his condition for the better. It also indicates the stability of the dreamer’s life and may indicate that he will marry a righteous woman. An unmarried young man sees the desert in a dream, and the desert is beautiful in appearance and has crops, and this dream is evidence of his marriage to a beautiful and good girl. Interpretation of a dream about the desert in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says that if he dreams A person was in the desert and walked in it and did not find an end to the path he was walking on. This vision indicates that the dreamer is exposed to many worries and problems. If a person sees the desert with green plants, this dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve all his desires and all the goals he desires. For a person to see dense sand in the desert and water to abundant livelihood and a lot of money that the dreamer will earn. Seeing a married woman in the desert, in this vision, is evidence that there are many people who wish her harm and getting into trouble, and her seeing scorpions and snakes indicates that the woman is exposed to many problems. And sorrows. The dream may indicate marital problems that lead to divorce. A married woman seeing that she is in the desert and it is full of crops and palm trees, in this dream is a sign of her husband’s love.

A married woman seeing that she is in the desert and it is full of crops and palm trees, in this dream is a sign of her husband’s love.

title: Interpretation of seeing yellow in a dream

preview.html: As is the case with any dream, the interpretation of seeing the color yellow in a dream varies according to the dreamer of this vision, whether he is a man, a married woman, or a pregnant woman, in addition to its interpretation also differing according to what is present in this vision. color. Interpretation of seeing the color yellow by Ibn Sirin. Many interpreters of dreams and visions, led by Ibn Sirin, said that the color yellow has many connotations that differ depending on the shade of the color. While the light yellow color indicates problems, whether health, illness, fatigue, or problems and disagreements at the family level, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the color yellow for a man. The meanings of the color yellow in a man’s dream vary depending on its color: radiant yellow or pale yellow. The radiant yellow color in a man’s dream indicates good news and food, while the pale yellow color indicates problems and crises, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the color yellow for a woman. Single woman: If the dreamer is an unmarried girl and sees the light yellow color in her dream, this is an expression of vitality and activity and that she will perform excellently in study or work, and it is the color that indicates jealousy or self-love. Sometimes. While she sees the color pale yellow, this indicates that she is falling into psychological crises, such as feeling severe depression or constant excessive pressure from envy and haters around her. Interpretation of seeing the color yellow for a married woman When a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing something bright, bright yellow, this means It indicates a good sign, as it indicates money and prosperity and that her life is free of complaints. The color in its meaning is not to be praised, because it expresses illness, grief, and falling into seizures, and God knows best. Also, the yellow color is not desirable if the clothes are close together because it expresses negative changes in marital life, especially in financial matters. But if a married woman sees the color yellow in Her husband’s clothes in a dream, this indicates her feeling of jealousy, as she is always busy with his affairs, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the color yellow for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing yellow in her dream or sees that in the things she buys, then this is a good omen, which she should not wish for at all, because it symbolizes Anguish and hatred, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of the dream of Kunafa in a dream for single and married women in detail

preview.html: Today we share with you the interpretation of a dream about kunafa, which is one of the most famous foods preferred by those who are fasting in the holy month of Ramadan, so that the dreamer feels the dream when it seems to him that he has good skin. It also comes with different interpretations, as it is the type of food rich in sugars composed of yeast that provides the body with energy. It also It contains high levels of proteins, iodine, iron and phosphorus, while many people wonder about the interpretation of seeing kunafa in a dream and its various connotations.. The spells of this vision, so follow us.Interpretation of a dream of kunafaInterpretation of a dream of kunafa in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing kunafa in a dream is one of the visions that carry many meanings. Dream interpretation scholars have interpreted these visions in various interpretation books, from which we study the most important of what was mentioned in the following lines, according to what was stated in the interpretations of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation scholars point out that seeing kunafa in a dream with an enemy symbolizes hearing a lot of good and joyful news that brings Joy to souls. The dream of a fortune teller in a dream symbolizes that someone offers him Kunafa dessert in a dream. It means the emotional calm and psychological stability that he enjoys throughout his life, apart from the good company that brings happiness to himself. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is eating dry, solid kunafa that does not contain cream or fat. It symbolizes his disappointments in his life and exposes him to many hardships and pain that surround him from all sides, and God knows best. And knowing the consumption of Kunafa with sugar. It shows goodness in one’s life, in addition to that it can symbolize high status and the abundance of money and benefits that flow into one’s life, or it can indicate the ability to support and pay the heavy debts one has. Seeing fenugreek eaten in large quantities indicates that the dreamer receives love. From a tour of work and home, or perhaps it indicates that the dreamer becomes the subject of conversation and love from the other party in his life, or the object of everyone’s admiration, and this dream can symbolize the intensity of intelligence and the ability to deal with things very intelligently. While some scholars believe that consuming kunafa excessive; It is a dream that does not bode well. It indicates that the viewer is exposed to a health crisis except that tests will be conducted soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of eating kunafa in a dream for a single woman A single girl is wondering about seeing kunafa in a dream. And what does it symbolize, let us learn about these interpretations that have many meanings, such as: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about a ferret symbolizes sincere love that will enter her life, or perhaps marriage soon, and this vision may indicate that Almighty God will relieve the viewer of the worry, sadness, and anguish that You live it. Seeing a marten in an unmarried woman’s dream means that Almighty God will soon give her the good news of joy, as well as the good news that she will hear the good news soon. Buying a ferret in a dream for a single woman. Buying a ferret in a person’s dream is one of the visions that brings goodness to her folds. Here are the most prominent of these interpretations that he came up with: For an unmarried girl to see in her dream that she is entering a store

title: Interpretation of pears in a dream, pumpkin and pears in a dream

preview.html: Seeing pear fruit in a dream, for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women, buying and picking red and green pears, and eating the fruit according to Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of the shape of pears in dreams. Pears in a dream indicate sickness and disease. Pears in a dream are an expression of money for the one who ate it or ate it, because half a word. (Rich) indicates wealth or wealth. It was said in the same direction: Yellow pears are money in sickness or weakness. It is also said that it is a tree that indicates non-Arab men running with their families to earn money. In the same context it was said: If a woman dreams that she is carrying a pear, then she will become pregnant, and if she gives birth She will give birth to a boy. And the person who sees in a dream that he is picking pears in baskets, boxes or bags, then a lot of money will worry him, so it is good to collect or manage them. Pears are in season food, or a person appears after a long absence. But not at the right time shows illness or weakness. If a sick person dreams in a dream that he is eating pears, then he will recover from his illness, God willing. Interpretation of pears in a dream according to Nabulsi: Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said in his interpretation of eating pears in a dream that it refers to the money that a person earns or can earn, and it is lawful money. The interpreters who went to the interpretation of eating pears in a dream in addition to this interpretation said that seeing pears and eating them in a dream and the dream is a sign of illness, disease or exhaustion, and the dream is not praised and it is called that the dream combines the meanings of fatigue and exhaustion. And illness and the money that its owner earns after being tired. Al-Nabulsi said: Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he found in front of him a lot of pears or pears and he ate them or did not eat and it was all he had, then the dreamer will inherit money, and God Almighty knows what is best. Commentators interpreted the vision of pears and eating Pears at an inappropriate time as a sign of improper and unresolved collection of money. Seeing pears, or as they call them pears, and eating them in a dream is evidence of health, blessings, and good eyesight, because pears or pears are among the fruits that can remain for a period without spoiling and remain valid. To eat. And the dream is out of season. Interpretation of eating pears in a dream: Pears or pears indicate goodness, blessings, and food in general, but there are a few exceptions that are far from these meanings. Seeing ripe pears, which appear green or red, indicates money and livelihood if a person eats them in His sleep and its taste are sweet, for he will be blessed in the near future, God willing, with lawful and suspicious-free money. In the event that one sees that he is eating pears that taste sour or bad, then the vision shows sadness and misfortunes that may befall the dreamer in his coming days, causing him sadness and despair. A vision of eating pears Bile in a dream indicates illness and disease that afflicts the dreamer in reality, and this is what the interpreters mentioned. Whoever sees in his dream that it is a ripe pear in a dream is evidence of sustenance and gaining money. And whoever sees in his dream that he is trying to eat a pear but he is unable and it is difficult for him to eat, then the dream indicates food. Or the food that the dreamer eats b

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream What is the importance of the symbol of white clothes for a single woman? What did the interpreters say about seeing a married woman wearing expensive white clothes? Is the new white dress different in interpretation from the old white dress? Find out the details of the vision in the following article. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google website Interpretation of dreams in a bank White dress in a dream The symbol of the white dress includes hundreds of important connotations, and according to the vision, the dreamer will know its precise meaning as follows: Looking at the expensive white dress: indicates a profitable job, or a promotion that the dreamer desires, or the dreamer’s elevation among the people because of his reputation. Unquestionable kindness. Dreaming of a white dress decorated with jewels: It indicates an abundance of money and wealth and is interpreted as a high position and the monarch may reach a leadership position or a higher position in the state. Seeing a long white dress in a dream: It is interpreted as concealment, purity and a high religious status. For the dreamer, the vision indicates the dreamer’s victory and victory over his enemies, because the scene is interpreted as divine protection. Dreaming of a white silk dress: It indicates pride and strength among women, but a man who wears silk, regardless of its color, is a disobedient man who has many female relationships and lacks chivalry. And masculinity. You see yourself wearing white cotton clothes: It is interpreted as kindness and nourishment, provided that the dress is soft and comfortable. You dream of a new white dress: It indicates the joys that fill the coming days. Perhaps new white clothes mean a new job, happy news, or moving from One life to another is even better. Check out the old white dress: It is interpreted by the return of an old person in the dreamer’s life. The single woman may return to her ex-fiancé, and the divorced woman may reconcile with her ex-husband and return to him. Perhaps the scene shows poverty and losses, if the white dress that the dreamer is wearing is dirty and unusable. The white dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that the best vision in which the dreamer sees the symbol of the white dress is to see the clean, loose white dress that fits the dreamer’s body. The white dress Loose clothes indicate abundance of sustenance and blessing in money and physical and psychological health. Whoever faces difficulties in his life and does not find comfort or stability, and sees that he takes off the tight or short white dress and puts on a long, heavy white dress, then he sees the world beautiful and full of pleasures, because God helps him. For him with happiness and peace of mind. The dreamer who lives by handicrafts. In reality, if he sees in his dream that his clothes are white, he can sit at home for a while without working or ask for leave to feel relieved from the pressure of work. Signs that you do not know about the symbol of the white dress in a dream. White dress in a dream For a single woman: If an unmarried woman dreams that she wears a white dress in her sleep and prays in it, knowing that the dress was loose, and assuming that her prayer in the dream was dawn, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about the color white in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about white color in a dream Interpretation of a dream about white color in a dream has many connotations and meanings, as the meaning of white color in a dream varies according to the circumstances of the dreamer. The dream and reassurance, but the dream shows the same thing or not, when the white color appears clearly in the dream, and in detail, this is a sign that there is something related to feelings and emotions, because the white color is the basis of everything and in general it indicates calmness and psychological tranquility of the dream of its owner. Interpretation of a dream The white color in a dream for Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi says that a dream about white has many different meanings and interpretations, such as: The white color in a dream also shows generosity, sincerity, affection, and excessive love, and it has a strong indication of high status. Whoever sees that he is wearing white clothes, this indicates that the dreamer is His mind is wise and rational, and if he is wearing a shirt, this indicates his recovery from his condition. Illness. If he dreams that he is wearing a white hat, this is a sign that he is thinking in a healthy and positive way. And if he sees a white cell phone, this means that he will receive good news soon. If he sees the furniture of his house turning white, this means that happiness will take over this house God willing. And if he sees that he is wearing white shoes, this is evidence that he will accept marriage soon and that he will succeed in this step, or that he will obtain a great status. And when you see a cat in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has great love and is very tolerant. Seeing a white dog in a dream is evidence of the presence of an enemy among friends. It shows love, and it is different from hatred, envy, and enmity. Interpretation of the color white in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees white in a dream and her color is clean and pure, this is a clear indication that she is living in an emotional state, and it also shows that she has someone who loves her very much. And when She sees that she is wearing a white dress, this indicates that her wedding is approaching. Interpretation of the color white in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. If a married woman sees the color white in her dream, this means that she is living a stable life without problems or that the problems she is suffering from will end and disappear as quickly as possible. Possible. And if she sees that one of her things has become white, this is evidence of her husband’s love for her, because the white color in the year indicates love and peace. It also expresses reconciliation in the event of a dispute between spouses and putting an end to the dispute. Interpretation of the color white in a dream by Ibn Shaheen about the pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees the color white in a dream, this indicates the end of her troubles and the time of her birth is approaching, and it is said that she will give birth to the child she wants, and God Almighty knows best. And in the end Our article talked about the interpretation of seeing the color white in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, and its interpretation for the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant, and the certainty that knowledge remains. Only with Almighty God.
